abstract.t: This document specifies a standards-track version of the Proportional Rate Reduction (PRR) algorithm that obsoletes the experimental version described in [RFC6937]. PRR regulates the amount of data sent by TCP or other transport protocols during fast recovery. PRR accurately regulates the actual flight size through recovery such that at the end of recovery it will be as close as possible to the slow start threshold (ssthresh), as determined by the congestion control algorithm.
